price: 84. En Wij lieten regen op hen neerdalen. Zie dan wat het einde van de misdadigers was.
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-muj'rimīna
